script.task_description: packing yellow, blue, brown objects into the box called bin, not a black object.

instructions.rule0: you should never pick and place a box
instructions.rule1: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
instructions.rule2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
instructions.rule3: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
instructions.rule4: you must push a soft object to make more space in the bin, however, if there is a fragile object on the soft object, you must not push the object

instructions_sample1.rule0: don't pick and place a box called bin
instructions_sample1.rule1: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin
instructions_sample1.rule2: when fold a object, the fragile object must be in the bin
instructions_sample1.rule3: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out the rigid object and replace it into the bin
instructions_sample1.rule4: you must push a soft object to make more space in the bin, however, if there is a fragile object on the soft object, you must not push the object

instructions_sample2.rule0: you should never pick and place a box
instructions_sample2.rule1: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object
instructions_sample2.rule2: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
instructions_sample2.rule3: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted

goal.goal1: packing all objects into the bin
goal.goal2: if there is a black object, don't packing it
